short.ar: Download Twitch Video. Record and Download Twitch live stream. Save Twitch live streams and videos.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: Twitch Video Downloader to save any video, record and download lives.
short.da: Save Twitch video or live stream. You can record any Twitch stream and save it to your PC. Download Twitch video.
short.de: Twitch Video Downloader zum Speichern beliebiger Videos, Aufzeichnen und Herunterladen von Live.
short.hu: Twitch video downloader. Twitch Video Saver. Live stream recorder and downloader. Save Twitch video or live stream to your PC.
short.id: Twitch Video Saver. Record and download any live stream on Twitch. Download any video from Twitch.
short.tr: Video Downloader for Twitch. Twitch Video Saver. Save any Twitch live stream to your PC. Download video from Twitch.
